featured.text: I was taking a walk in the park… E.…have carried out many welfare programs.

definition.zh_def: 福利，指政府或社會提供的幫助和支持，以改善人們的生活條件。
definition.en_def: Welfare refers to the assistance and support provided by the government or society to improve people's living conditions.
definition.example: The government increased welfare benefits to help families in need.
